description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: International German championship of sand yachts at St Peter-Ording; an attempt to create an atomic time scale; research on measuring units at the Federal Institute of Physics and Technology at Brunswick; Dr Kiesinger visits the Middle East; a tour of Augsburg, historical and modern; the 82nd German Catholic Rally at Essen; a computer Congress in Berlin; the Baden Grand Prix at the Iflezheim course.
